select
DATE(u.register_time) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(u.register_time, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(u.register_time, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
count(*) as `value`, u.province as `group` from user u
where u.province = #{province}
where exists ( select province from ( select province from ( select count(*) as v, a.province from user a where a.register_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and exists (select * from bank_card b where a.login_name = b.login_name and b.status='PASSED')
and exists (select * from account ac where a.login_name = ac.login_name)
group by province ) t order by v desc limit 5 ) p where p.province = u.province )
and u.register_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and exists (select * from bank_card b where u.login_name = b.login_name and b.status='PASSED')
and exists (select * from account ac where u.login_name = ac.login_name)
group by u.province,
date(u.register_time)
year(u.register_time), week(u.register_time)
year(u.register_time), month(u.register_time)
union all select
DATE(u.register_time) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(u.register_time, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(u.register_time, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
count(*) as `value`, '其它' as `group` from user u where not exists ( select province from ( select province from ( select count(*) as v, a.province from user a where a.register_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and exists (select * from bank_card b where a.login_name = b.login_name and b.status='PASSED')
and exists (select * from account ac where a.login_name = ac.login_name)
group by province ) t order by v desc limit 5 ) p where p.province = u.province ) and u.register_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and exists (select * from bank_card b where u.login_name = b.login_name and b.status='PASSED')
and exists (select * from account ac where u.login_name = ac.login_name)
group by
date(u.register_time)
year(u.register_time), week(u.register_time)
year(u.register_time), month(u.register_time)

SELECT
DATE(r.`created_time`) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(r.`created_time`, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(r.`created_time`, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
ROUND(SUM(r.`amount`/100), 2) AS `value`, u.`province` AS `group` FROM `recharge` r JOIN
`user` u ON r.`login_name` = u.`login_name` AND u.`province` = #{province}
(SELECT * FROM `user` t WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT n.`province` FROM `recharge` m JOIN `user` n ON m.`login_name` = n.`login_name` WHERE m.`created_time` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND m.`status` = 'SUCCESS' GROUP BY n.`province` ORDER BY ROUND(SUM(m.`amount`), 2) DESC LIMIT 5) temp WHERE t.`province` = temp.`province`)) u ON r.`login_name` = u.`login_name`
WHERE r.`created_time` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND r.`status` = 'SUCCESS' GROUP BY u.`province`,
DATE(r.`created_time`)
CONCAT(YEAR(r.`created_time`), '-', WEEK(r.`created_time`))
CONCAT(YEAR(r.`created_time`), '-', MONTH(r.`created_time`))
UNION ALL SELECT
DATE(a.`created_time`) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(a.`created_time`, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(a.`created_time`, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
ROUND(SUM(a.`amount`/100), 2) AS `value`, '其他' AS `group` FROM `recharge` a JOIN (SELECT * FROM `user` b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT d.`province` FROM `recharge` c JOIN `user` d ON c.`login_name` = d.`login_name` WHERE c.`created_time` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND c.`status` = 'SUCCESS' GROUP BY d.`province` ORDER BY ROUND(SUM(c.`amount`), 2) DESC LIMIT 5) temp1 WHERE b.`province` = temp1.`province`)) e ON a.`login_name` = e.`login_name` WHERE a.`created_time` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND a.`status` = 'SUCCESS' GROUP BY
DATE(a.`created_time`)
CONCAT(YEAR(a.`created_time`), '-', WEEK(a.`created_time`))
CONCAT(YEAR(a.`created_time`), '-', MONTH(a.`created_time`))
